ext_weather.name: Today
ext_weather.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Periods Of Rain
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers between 9am and noon, then periods of rain. Cloudy, with a high near 56. South wind 0 to 20 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.
